headline: Is Packaging Corporation of America (PKG) Pricing Fair After Strong Multi‑Year Share Gains?
summary: If you have been wondering whether Packaging Corporation of America at around US$223 per share still offers fair value, this article is designed to walk you through the key pieces of the puzzle. The stock has recorded returns of 0.9% over the last 7 days, 6.0% over the last 30 days, 6.0% year to date, 8.6% over 1 year, 70.8% over 3 years, and 95.2% over 5 years, which may have you asking how that lines up with the current price. Recent news coverage around Packaging Corporation of America...
